summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period of July 1, 2018, to July 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, indicating the financial activity of an account associated with Darren K. Indyke.

keyFacts: The account balance as of July 31, 2018, was $5,268.35.
Interest earned during the period was $204.97.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF (non-sufficient funds) charges during the statement period.
The document outlines procedures for disputing errors on the account statement.
Darren K. Indyke is identified as the attorney associated with the account.
